edge: Elisa works as a cleaner at the secret government laboratory in Baltimore, Maryland.
Elisa communicates through sign language and works as a cleaner at the secret government laboratory in Baltimore, Maryland.
Elisa lives a routine life in an apartment above a movie theater.
Elisa, who was found abandoned by the side of a river as an infant with scars on her neck, is mute and communicates through sign language.
Elisa discovers the mysterious creature from a South American river at the Baltimore facility for study and forms a bond with it.
Colonel Richard Strickland captures the mysterious creature from a South American river and takes it to the Baltimore facility for study.
General Frank Hoyt is eventually persuaded by Colonel Richard Strickland to vivisect the Amphibian Man for further study.
Scientist Dr. Robert Hoffstetler, a Russian spy named Dimitri Mosenkov, pleads unsuccessfully to Colonel Richard Strickland to keep the Amphibian Man alive for further study.
Dr. Robert Hoffstetler, a Russian spy named Dimitri Mosenkov, is secretly ordered by his Soviet handlers to kill the Amphibian Man to prevent further study.
Elisa works as a cleaner at the secret government laboratory in Baltimore, Maryland.
Colonel Richard Strickland captures the mysterious creature from a South American river and takes it to the Baltimore facility for study.
plans to release into nearby canal
The creature touches Giles on his balding head and wounded arm.
After the creature touched him, hair began growing back on Giles' previously bald head.
The wounds on Giles' arm healed after the creature touched him.
Elisa continues to develop her romantic relationship with the Amphibian Man, culminating in sexual intercourse.
Unexpectedly, General Hoyt arrives at the laboratory and tells Strickland he has 36 hours to recover the Amphibian Man, or his career will be over.
Hoffstetler is told by his handlers that he will be extracted from the US in two days.
When Hoffstetler goes to meet his two handlers, Strickland follows him.
Strickland tortures the dying Hoffstetler into revealing the Amphibian Man's whereabouts.
Strickland threatens Zelda in her home unsuccessfully, until Zelda's husband Brewster reveals that Elisa has the Amphibian Man.
Zelda immediately telephones Elisa, warning her to release the creature.
Strickland finds Elisa's apartment empty and ransacks it until he finds evidence of the creature in the bathtub.
Strickland finds a calendar note revealing where Elisa plans to release the Amphibian Man.

At the canal, Elisa and Giles are bidding farewell to the creature when Strickland arrives, knocks Giles down, and shoots both the Amphibian Man and Elisa. The Amphibian Man heals himself and slashes Strickland's throat, killing him. As the police arrive on the scene with Zelda, the Amphibian Man takes Elisa and jumps into the canal, swimming around her lifeless body. He applies his healing powers/ability to the scars on Elisa's neck, which open to reveal gills like his. Elisa jolts back to life and they embrace and kiss.
